snippet: In some cases, material was republished with no credit at all, while other articles made passing reference to outside sources but failed to give proper credit when passages were taken verbatim or with minor changes.
abstract: Millennial news site Mic fires its news director Jared Keller after it was discovered he had lifted number of articles from other sources with proper attribution.
lead_paragraph: In some cases, material was republished with no credit at all, while other articles made passing reference to outside sources but failed to give proper credit when passages were taken verbatim or with minor changes.

headline.main: Mic News Director Is Fired After Plagiarism Accusations
headline.print_headline: Plagiarism at News Site; Editor Fired
